AssignmentId.description: Unique identifier of the investigation assignment as assigned by the initiating party.

OriginalTransactionId.description: Unique identifier of the original payment transaction, as assigned by ClearBank, to unambiguously identify the transaction. This identifier is passed on, unchanged, throughout the entire end-to-end chain.

RejectionCode.description: The reason for rejecting the recall.

TimestampRejected.description: Date and time the recall was rejected, in UTC.

AdditionalInformation.description: Additional information provided by the initiating party about the rejection.
